meta.content:

WELCOME TO TETON SCHOOL DISTRICT 401 CALENDARS OUR SCHOOLS STAFF LINKS EMPLOYMENT

div.a: TSD 401 extends home-based/online learning through end of school year

a.aria-label: TSD 401 extends home-based/online learning through end of school year

h2.a: TSD 401 extends home-based/online learning through end of school year

div.p: Citing that providing a safe environment for students and staff is its number one priority -- the opening words of the school district’s mission statement -- the Board of Trustees of Teton School District 401 voted unanimously Monday evening to extend home-based/online learning through the end of the academic school year. The decision came following two-plus hours of discussion of the district’s admin-team recommendation [...]

article.class: fusion-post-large post-157127 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-covid-19 category-district

div.a: Cancelation of high school and middle school sports and extracurricular activities

a.aria-label: Cancelation of high school and middle school sports and extracurricular activities

h2.a: Cancelation of high school and middle school sports and extracurricular activities

div.p: It is with sadness and regret that the Idaho High School Activities Association Board of Directors announces that all spring sport and activity seasons and all state tournaments are canceled. This decision was based on guidelines established by Governor Little, the Idaho State Board of Education, as well as feedback from schools and districts throughout the state. As the COVID-19 situation continued to evolve, [...]

article.class: fusion-post-large post-157125 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district

div.a: Please apply for free or reduced meals – Why it matters

a.aria-label: Please apply for free or reduced meals – Why it matters

h2.a: Please apply for free or reduced meals – Why it matters

div.p: All of us are stressed about the changes we now face. More than working or learning at home is the cruel reality that some people are working greatly reduced hours or can’t work at all. This means food budgets have been hit and hit hard. To help alleviate this stress, Teton School District ramped up our free meals program right after the school board [...]
